356:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'nupūrveṇa dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā yena bharukacche nagare muktāsāro hairaṇyakaḥ,
356:2: tenopasaṃkramya muktāsārahairaṇyakasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam|
356:3: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
356:5: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti|
356:6: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
356:8: so'vocat-ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtivyūhaṃ nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi|
356:9: apratiprasrabdhā ca me daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu dharmaparyeṣṭiḥ|
356:10: etamahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtivyūhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi, prajānāmi|
356:11: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmacchambhitasiṃhanādanādināṃ mahāpuṇyajñānapratiṣṭhitānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum||
356:13: ayamihaiva bharukacche nagare sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati|
356:17: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako muktāsārasya hairaṇyakasya pādau śirasābhivandya muktāsāraṃ hairaṇyakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya muktāsārasya hairaṇyakasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ||47||
